page.title: 05RECREATION IN SYDMONTON
page.content:
THE DOWNS PLAY A LARGE PART IN THE RECREATION OF THE AREA. WATERSHIP DOWN, WITH ITS LITERARY CONNECTIONS RECEIVES VISITORS BOTH LOCAL & FROM FURTHER AFIELD. IN PLEASANT WEATHER YOU CAN FIND PEOPLE UP THERE FLYING KITES & RADIO CONTROLLED AEROPLANES, BESIDES RAMBLING & PICNICKING.
AT WHITE HILL ON THE DOWNS, THERE IS A VIEWPOINT, WITH ACCOMPANYING CAR PARK & PICNIC AREA. THE PRESENCE OF SEVERAL RACING STABLES GIVES RISE TO GALLOPS & STEEPLECHASE COURSES ON TOP OF WATERSHIP. LOCAL HUNTS USE THE AREA & ON BOXING DAYS A DRAG HUNT IS HELD OVER THE DOWNS. THERE ARE MANY BRIDLE PATHS & PUBLIC FOOTPATHS, THOUGH MANY OF THE LATTER ARE OVERGROWN. ORGANISED PHEASANT SHOOTING IS VERY FREQUENT IN THE SEASON.
